member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:hms.entappsettings.webapi.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: M:hms.entappsettings.webapi.Controllers.AppSettingsController.GetAppSettings(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns RESULTANT App Settings for a given Tenant and AppSettingsGroup. NO internal settings published.
member.param: The Id of the Tenant whose settings to return. This should be hard configured in the internal application config.
The AppSetting Group Id (i.e. the type of client). This should be hard configured in the internal application config.

member.name: T:hms.entappsettings.webapi.Utils.MultiXmlDocumentationProvider
member.summary: A custom that reads the API documentation from a collection of XML documentation files. Leverages the XmlDocumentProvider shipped with the Microsoft WebAPI Help Pages.
member.remarks: You need to switch Document provider in the HelpPageConfig and ensure all XmlDocuments are copied to the App_Data folder. The copying is performed by the post-build script called CopyXmlDocs.cmd. Make sure this is setup for your drive
